Summary: Standing on the Boardwalk looking out over the Atlantic Ocean with about 40 other perple
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Atlantic City
There were no other sightings in Atlantic City on or around September 5th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsJust left the Casino in Atlantic City, New Jersey,,,went on the Boardwalk, looking out over the Ocean, when one of the other people spotted it.There had to be over 50 people in our area that saw it ,,,very clearly,,,It appeared to be a classic saucer shape,,,,over the water,,,30 degrees or so ,,,about 2 miles out over the water,,traveling south...we all saw it, some folks had a camera,,,almost everyone took out their cell phones to call someone...it traveled what appeared to be 50 mph...in a straight line ,,,then suddenly it just went straight up and out of sight at a very fast speed....no lights,,,just a lead grey color....I am certain that it should be in the New Jersey or Phila.Pa. news by tomorrow..I left the shore about 4:30 PM,,,and arrived home about 6:00 Pm.....I can only guess that it had to be over 100 feet long,,,some of us agreed to that size, some thought larger...I am enclosing a Photo,,,NOT THE OBJECT THAT WE SAW...I picked this out of a UFO sight,, merely to give you some idea of its size and shape....I Repeat...this photo is NOT the actual object that we all saw.....
